InPlaceClusterNode Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»InPlaceBorderNode. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Add Output AfterAdds a new output after the item whose Index you specify and returns a reference to the new terminal. Details
Remove OutputRemoves the output terminal at the Index you specify. Details
ResizeResizes the expandable Unbundle / Bundle Element border node to the height you specify. Details
